name: Losing Charge Demo
description:
Accompany Jay, a trans teenage boy, on his daily life with his dad and his twin sister Katy in this interactive comic.

Please fill out our survey after playing the game:
https://forms.gle/wvTBjsXJQzHQd85z8

This is a protoype. Only Chapter 1 is fully illustrated. The build is also quite large so be sure to delete the folder after playing so it doesn't clog up your disc space.

Credits:
Philip Cal - Director, Game Designer, Programmer
Marah Siemko - Writer, Production Manager
Lea Eberhardt - Storyboard Artist, Illustrator
Angelina Sieler - Storyboard Artist, Illustrator, Art Director
Liana Heinrich-Ax - Art Direction Consultant
Sina Gorski - Narrative Direction Consultant
